channel.title: Ok here is the main error im getting with my run.bat
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoclassDefFoundError: server
what should I do any ideas?

item.source: Ok here is the main error im getting with my run.bat

item.title: Ok here is the main error im getting with my run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Use this:

@echo off :menu title Main Menu cls echo Type Run to Run echo Type Compile to Compile echo Type Color to pick different text Colors echo. set /p c=Which one? if %c%==Run goto Run if %c%==Compile goto Compile if %c%==Color goto Color :Compile title Compiler cls javac *.java pause goto menu :Run title Run cls set CLASSPATH= java server :color cls echo Pick a text color: echo. echo Red echo Blue echo Green echo Dark_Blue echo Normal echo Purple echo. set /p c=Color of your choice? if %c%==Red color 04 if %c%==Blue color 03 if %c%==Green color 02 if %c%==Dark_Blue color 01 if %c%==Purple color 05 if %c%==Normal color 07 goto Menu
I’d get the same error upon running, so I made that. Hope it helps.

Read full topic
